column4: Hi All, I want to know what is the current support for ATI Radeon cards. Mostly about video playback. I'm having trouble with the open source driver (radeon) and fglrx. In case of radeon, the video play isn't of the right color, in case of fglrx is doesn't display the video at all ...
i'm assuming that you tried "sudo jockey-gtk"

: sure, I did. I manage to install both of them. It's not a matter of getting them working. My question is about the video playback of the driver. Both of them doesn't seams to work. So I'm wondering which one should actually work.
